name: Deathsketball
description:
Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move. P to pause.

Full screen is recommended.

This is a simple game where you must avoid the basketballs and survive as long as possible. This game may look like it was made in a weekend, but it actually took weeks mostly because I was experimenting with animation and the player controller. The goal of this project was to make a game that looks and feels good to play, with less focus on the actual gameplay. Have fun!

Created by: Luke Haggerty

Music by: HoliznaCC0
